name: Double Jump!!
description:
1. You need to control two roles at the same time, and make the two roles jump over all obstacles.
2. Two game modes: horizontal mode and vertical mode.
3. Single click to jump over the normal obstacle.
4. Double click to jump over the higher obstacle and the longer obstacle.
5. There are twenty different styles of game roles.
6. How long can you last out? Good luck!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mudotekgames
